items.name: Component_SceneBehavior
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_SceneBehavior
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_SceneBehavior extends gs.Component_Container
    ###*
    * The base class of all scene-behavior components. A scene-behavior component
    * define the logic of a single game scene. 
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Component_SceneBehavior
    * @extends gs.Component_Container
    * @memberof gs
    ###
    constructor: ->
        super()
        
        @loadingScreenVisible = no

    ###*
    * Initializes the scene. 
    *
    * @method initialize
    * @abstract
    ###
    initialize: ->
      
    ###*
    * Disposes the scene.
    *
    * @method dispose
    ###  
    dispose: ->
        if not GameManager.inLivePreview
            ResourceManager.dispose()
        @object.events?.emit("dispose", @object)
        
    
    ###*
    * Called if the preparation and transition
    * is done and the is ready to start.
    *
    * @method start
    ###  
    start: ->
        
    ###*
    * Prepares all visual game object for the scene.
    *
    * @method prepareVisual
    * @abstract
    ###  
    prepareVisual: ->
        
    ###*
    * Prepares all data for the scene and loads the necessary graphic and audio resources.
    *
    * @method prepareData
    * @abstract
    ### 
    prepareData: ->
     
    ###*
    * Prepares for a screen-transition.
    *
    * @method prepareTransition
    * @param {Object} transitionData - Object containing additional data for the transition 
    * like graphic, duration and vague.
    ###    
    prepareTransition: (transitionData) ->
        if transitionData?.graphic?.name.length > 0
            ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Masks/#{transitionData.graphic.name}")
    
    ###*
    * Executes a screen-transition.
    *
    * @method transition
    * @param {Object} transitionData - Object containing additional data for the transition 
    * like graphic, duration and vague.
    ###         
    transition: (transitionData) ->
        if $PARAMS.preview
            Graphics.transition(0)
        else
            transitionData = transitionData || SceneManager.transitionData
            if transitionData?.graphic?.name.length > 0
                Graphics.transition(transitionData.duration, ResourceManager.getBitmap("Graphics/Masks/#{transitionData.graphic.name}"), transitionData.vague || 30)
            else
                Graphics.transition(transitionData.duration)
    
    ###*
    * Update the scene's content.
    *
    * @method updateContent
    * @abstract
    ###         
    updateContent: ->
    
    ###*
    * Sets up the loading screen.
    *
    * @method prepareLoadingScreen
    ###     
    prepareLoadingScreen: ->
        @loadingBackgroundSprite = new gs.Sprite()
        
        if gs.Platform.isWeb and !GameManager.inLivePreview
            bitmap = new gs.Bitmap(300, 100)
            bitmap.font.name = "Times New Roman"
            bitmap.drawText(0, 0, 300, 100, "NOW LOADING", 1, 1)
            @loadingBackgroundSprite.x = (Graphics.width - bitmap.width) / 2
            @loadingBackgroundSprite.y = (Graphics.height - bitmap.height) / 2
            @loadingBackgroundSprite.bitmap = bitmap
            @loadingBackgroundSprite.srcRect = new gs.Rect(0, 0, bitmap.width, bitmap.height)
     
    ###*
    * Disposes the loading screen.
    *
    * @method clearLoadingScreen
    ###    
    clearLoadingScreen: ->
        if @loadingBackgroundSprite
            if gs.Platform.isWeb and !GameManager.inLivePreview
                @loadingBackgroundSprite.bitmap.dispose()
            @loadingBackgroundSprite.dispose()
            @loadingBackgroundSprite = null
            
    ###*
    * Called once per frame while a scene is loading. Can be used to display
    * loading-message/animation.
    *
    * @method loading
    ### 
    loading: ->
        if not @loadingBackgroundSprite2?
            @loadingBackgroundSprite2 = {}
            ###
            bitmap = new gs.Bitmap(300, 100)
            bitmap.drawText(0, 0, 300, 100, "NOW LOADING", 1, 1)
            @loadingBackgroundSprite = new gs.Sprite()
            @loadingBackgroundSprite.x = (Graphics.width - bitmap.width) / 2
            @loadingBackgroundSprite.y = (Graphics.height - bitmap.height) / 2
            @loadingBackgroundSprite.bitmap = bitmap
            @loadingBackgroundSprite.srcRect = new gs.Rect(0, 0, bitmap.width, bitmap.height)
            ###
            
            if Graphics.frozen then @transition({ duration: 0 })

    ###*
    * Update the scene.
    *
    * @method update
    ### 
    update: ->
        super()
        
        if DataManager.documentsLoaded
            if @object.loadingData and not @object.initialized then @prepareData()
            @object.loadingData = !DataManager.documentsLoaded
        
        if not @object.loadingData and ResourceManager.resourcesLoaded
            if @object.loadingResources and not @object.initialized
                if not @loadingScreenVisible
                    @prepareVisual() 
                @object.initialized = yes
            @object.loadingResources = false
    
        if ResourceManager.resourcesLoaded and DataManager.documentsLoaded
            @object.loading = false
        
            if Graphics.frozen and @object.preparing
                Graphics.update()
            else
                if @loadingScreenVisible
                    if @object.loaded
                        @loadingScreenVisible = no
                        @object.loaded = yes
                        @updateContent()
                    else
                        if not Graphics.frozen then Graphics.freeze()
                        @clearLoadingScreen()
                        @object.loaded = yes
                        @object.setup()
                        @prepareVisual() 
                        @loadingScreenVisible = no
                        Graphics.update()
                        Input.update()
                else
                    @clearLoadingScreen()
                    if @object.preparing
                        @object.preparing = no
                        @start()
                    Graphics.update()
                    @updateContent() if !Graphics.frozen
                    Input.update()
                    

        else
            @loadingScreenVisible = yes
            Graphics.update()
            Input.update()
            @loading()
            
        
                
        
gs.Component_SceneBehavior = Component_SceneBehavior
